product.title: CHICHUMID 20Pcs Metal U Shaped Hot Roller Clips for Hot Roller Curler Clips 3 In
product.description:
Description

Practical hairdressing styling tools for women, men, girls. Fit for different hair types. -hot curler clipsWet the hair a little and curl the hair to make the curls firmer and effectively create stylish wavy hair. Sufficient quantity for you to use, replace or share with your friends or family. Suitable for home DIY use and salon shop. Hot Roller Clip will not damage your hair.-flexible hair rollers

Features

-Color:Silver
-Material:Metal 
-Size:7.50X1.90X0.20cm/2.95X0.75X0.08in
- Designed to fit most sizes of electric hot rollers, offering versatility and compatibility for different hair types.-fixing clips
- U-shaped clip design provides a , preventing it from slipping and ensuring a , useful.-assorted hot roller clips
- Crafted with metal materials, the roller clip is durable and resistant to wear or tear, ensuring long-term using.-electric curling roller replacement clip
- Easy-to-use replacement clip allows for quick and changing between different sizes of hair rollers.-perm rods clips
- Rapid heating feature allows for conveniently and efficiently curling, saving you time, achieving desired hairstyle.-perm rollers clips

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
